hero.subtitle: A guild-based project management app built for gaming groups. Create your own guild, invite your party, and conquer quests together.

features.title: Everything your party needs
features.description: Each guild gets a private workspace with projects, tasks, and documents. Whether you are running a campaign, organizing raid nights, or managing a gaming community -- keep everything in one place.
features.campaignDescription: Organize your TTRPG campaigns with ease. Track storylines, NPCs, and plot hooks across multiple sessions.
features.partyDescription: Keep your gaming group in sync. Assign tasks, schedule sessions, and make sure everyone knows their role.
features.worldDescription: Document your lore, maps, and world details. Build rich settings your players will love to explore.
features.questDescription: Never lose track of side quests again. Manage objectives, rewards, and story progression in one place.
features.sessionDescription: Collaborative documents for session recaps, player handouts, and shared party knowledge.
features.eventDescription: Coordinate game nights, raid schedules, and guild events. Everyone stays on the same page.

gallery.title: Built for your workflow
gallery.projectCaption: Organize projects with boards, lists, and custom views
gallery.documentCaption: Collaborate on documents with your entire guild

useCases.title: Your guild, your way
useCases.description: Create a private guild for your group. Invite members, organize into initiatives, and manage projects together. Everyone stays in sync, and your data stays yours.
useCases.ttrpgDesc: Manage campaigns, track quests, and share session notes with your adventuring party.
useCases.mmoDesc: Coordinate raid schedules, loot distribution, and guild events.
useCases.esportsDesc: Track practice schedules, tournament prep, and team objectives.
useCases.communityDesc: Organize events, manage projects, and keep your community engaged.

cta.title: Ready to <1>level up</1>?
cta.description: Join gaming groups already using Initiative to stay organized and have more fun together.
